entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
